content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 0, 0)

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2, 0)

### New Stone Furnace at position (2, 2)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2, 2)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inventory management
- Ensure that the inventory of the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. For example, the second furnace at position (2, 0) had a full inventory when trying to insert iron plates.
- Make sure to have enough materials in your inventory to craft required items. For instance, there were not enough iron plates to craft transport belts.

### Errors when using furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt. The first furnace at position (0, 0) and the second furnace at position (2, 0) reported having no ingredients to smelt.
- Check that the furnace has fuel available. The new stone furnace at position (2, 2) and the first furnace at position (0, 0) reported being out of fuel.

### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure that the position you are trying to place an entity is not occupied by another entity. There were no specific instances of this error in the logs, but it is a common issue to be aware of.

### Errors when crafting
- Make sure to gather all necessary materials before attempting to craft items. For example, there was an error related to not having enough materials to craft a steam engine.
